title: *NO FEE* Fully renovated 1 bedroom w/porch for *OCT 1*
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302367845', 'Rent: $2,295 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Garbage, Heat, Hot Water, Water', 'Parking:: no parking', '*NO FEE* Fully renovated 1 bedroom w/porch for *OCT 1*', '*This apartment will be renovated during September for a Oct 1 move-in date.', 'Pics are from a renovated unit in the same complex.', 'Finishes will be the same.', 'New kitchen with white cabinets and SS appliances (fridge, micro, and stove, possible a dishwasher).', 'Quartz c-tops and breakfast bar.', 'New bathroom with modern finishes.', 'New floors.', 'Updated electrical and fresh paint.*', 'The parking areas are currently being renovated.', 'Once complete, you can rent an off-street spot for $150 per month', 'Rent directly through management and pay NO BROKER FEES!!', 'Please call, text or email.', 'Email preferred', 'IF YOU ARE REPLYING THROUGH CL, PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR ACTUAL EMAIL ADDRESS IN REPLY', 'Eric Sorenson', 'Leasing Agent', 'Micozzi Management 159 Cambridge St Allston MA 02134', 'Micozzi Management owns and professionally manages all of our buildings.', 'If this isnt exactly what you are looking for, follow the link below to check out our other apartment options.', 'All our listings are here', 'https://ygl.is/100156', 'As an equal opportunity housing provider, Micozzi Management provides housing opportunities regardless of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, physical or mental disability, familial status or any other classification protected by applicable federal, state or local law.', '106-116 Tremont are professionally managed buildings in the Oak Square neighborhood of Brighton.', 'The location is fabulous, right on the Newton line.', 'The local 57 bus goes right by the building, as well as the 501/503 express buses(which go downtown and to Copley Sq).', 'The Mass Pike is a quick 3 minute drive.', 'A quick walk into Oak Sq, enjoy the YMCA, Dunkin Donuts and many other places for entertaining.', 'Tenants here enjoy free heat, and hot water in the rent.', 'All apartments have terrific closet space.', 'Professional landscaping and snow removal.', 'There is laundry on site and an elevator in the building.', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Balcony', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Elevator', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Porch', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)']
